headline: Caesars Made a Bet on Las Vegas. Now It’s Paying For It.
summary: The casino operator saw its shares fall 15% after its quarterly earnings, mostly attributable to weak Las Vegas revenue. After the pandemic, and with the gambling industry changing, putting most of its chips on Vegas might not have been such a good idea.
